title: 820-00165 no sound card after water damage
message:
Got an  macbook  air with water damage cleaned the board,  system  boots  fine  now but  audio  is  inactive  in OS, where  should i  start from  

Thanks

title: 820-00165 no sound card after water damage
message: Where was original corrosion? Using known good DC in board? J9500 look good especially the joints facing the fan?

title: 820-00165 no sound card after water damage
message: Yeah, probably J9500 connector, 821-1722-A ribbon joining it to the DC board or the DC board itself

title: 820-00165 no sound card after water damage
message: First thing to try is another IO board and flat cable.
